attributes.comment:
This is ridiculous! My husband and I are in the process of adopting our 2nd
daughter from China. We have already paid the fees once to immigration for our I-
600A and fingerprints for this adoption. The wait for China adoptions continues to
lengthen, and the cost for international adoption is very high! You should not be
increasing these fees for pre-adoptive families as we already pay enough! In fact,
the immigration dept. should consider lengthening the validity timeframe of our I-
171H's. We can not help the fact that it is taking so long to adopt from China.
This additional proposed increase in fees is outrageous. With all the money that
is spent on the Iraq war, there is no reason why adoptive families should have to
pay more money to immigration!

STOP MAKING THIS A POLITICAL GAME!!! GET SENSIBLE~USE THE MONEY
YOU ALREADY HAVE WISELY AND QUIT EXPECTING MIDDLE INCOME
FAMILIES TO SPEND MORE!! WE ARE TRYING TO ABANDONED CHILDREN
FROM CHINA HAVE LOVING HOMES!!! MORE AND MORE FAMILIES CAN'T
AFFORD TO DO THIS IF YOU CONTINUE TO INCREASE FEES!!!

Also, fee increase was not last done in 1998. It was more recent than that. I
know this because we had to pay twice back in 2001 & 2002 when we adopted
the 1st time. Everytime, we apply to USCIS for adoption, the fees continues to go
up. QUIT INCREASING THE FEES!!!

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Mary Ellen Lederer
